name: Orbital Voyage
description:
ORBITAL VOYAGE

The game is a retro 3D lowpoly platformer consisting of three levels. It's about an astronaut who crashes in space and must find a way back home. Will he succeed?

This game was our first game made in Godot engine. We could say that it was a kind of test for us, because we want to develop in gamedev direction and work on even better games. 

Good luck and let us know what do you think about our game!

TRIBAL LYNX STUDIO
Programmer - Haoumaru 
3d artist - Rosman
